meanings.sent1: The slittiest cat in the neighborhood always finds the smallest spaces to hide.
meanings.sent2: She wore the slittiest dress to the party, attracting everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The slittiest squirrel in the park managed to squeeze through the tiniest gap in the fence.
meanings.sent4: His slittiest fingers delicately picked up the fragile glass ornament.
meanings.sent5: The slittiest thread held the pieces of the puzzle together.
